meta.description: Resume profile definitions for interactive resume builder - v1.1.0 with corrected Strategy profile focus

profiles.label: Brand Management
profiles.description: Brand marketing, portfolio management, launch excellence, and tactical execution
profiles.tagline: Brand Management Leader driving portfolio growth and launch excellence across therapeutic areas
profiles.headline: Brand Management Leader | Portfolio Strategy, Launch Excellence, Campaign Execution
competencies: Manages multi-million dollar brand portfolios with proven track record of exceeding revenue targets and market share growth
Orchestrates successful product launches through meticulous planning, cross-functional coordination, and flawless execution
Develops and executes integrated marketing campaigns across HCP and patient audiences, optimizing budget allocation for maximum ROI
Partners with sales, medical affairs, and market access teams to ensure aligned brand messaging and tactical implementation

profiles.label: Strategic Planning & Positioning
profiles.description: Brand strategy, messaging development, positioning, competitive strategy, and business planning
profiles.tagline: Strategic Planning Leader crafting compelling brand narratives and competitive positioning in pharmaceutical markets
profiles.headline: Strategic Planning & Positioning Leader | Brand Strategy, Messaging, Competitive Intelligence
competencies: Develops breakthrough positioning strategies that differentiate brands in crowded therapeutic categories and drive prescriber preference
Crafts compelling messaging platforms that resonate with diverse stakeholders while navigating complex regulatory requirements
Conducts sophisticated competitive intelligence and market analysis to identify strategic opportunities and defend market position
Builds persuasive business cases and strategic recommendations that secure executive buy-in and drive commercial success

profiles.label: Customer Experience (CX) & Omnichannel Innovation
profiles.description: Customer experience design, omnichannel orchestration, AI implementation, and digital innovation
profiles.tagline: CX & Innovation Leader transforming pharmaceutical engagement through AI-powered experiences and omnichannel excellence
profiles.headline: CX & Omnichannel Innovation Leader | AI Implementation, Digital Transformation, Experience Design
competencies: Pioneers AI-driven marketing solutions including custom GPT development, automated workflows, and intelligent content generation
Designs seamless omnichannel experiences that connect digital and personal touchpoints across the customer journey
Implements advanced data engineering and automation solutions that enhance personalization and drive measurable engagement lift
Leads digital transformation initiatives that modernize marketing capabilities and establish competitive advantage through innovation

filtering_rules.notes: Bullets are scored by counting how many priority_tags they match. Higher scores = more relevant. If a role has no tag matches, show the first N bullets as fallback.
